siteMetadata.description: Lab website for Hongwu Du's lab at University of Science and Technology Beijing

node.excerpt: Cencan xing is working on a range of important issues in the developmental lineage of zebrafish embryos and the clinical translation of MSCs. cencan xing received his PhD from Tsinghua University and completed his postdoctoral research.
